TunableList.name: CALENDAR_FILTER_DATA
TunableList.description: A List of Categories and Filters for use in filtering the Calendar data in the SchedulePane.

TunableTuple.description: A tuple of Category and the filters for the category.

Tunable.name: category_name
Tunable.description: The string to be used for the name of the category these filters belong to.

TunableList.name: filters
TunableList.description: Filter data used in the calendar

TunableTuple.description: Defines a single filter in the Calendar's filter component.

TunableList.name: entry_types
TunableList.description: The entries which will be captured by this filter.

Tunable.name: filter_name
Tunable.description: The name for this filter displayed in the calendar's filter component.

Tunable.name: is_birthday_filter
Tunable.description: If enabled, birthday entries will be captured by this filter.

Tunable.name: is_favorite_filter
Tunable.description: If enabled, only favorited entries which also match the other criteria, will be captured by this filter.

Tunable.name: is_work_filter
Tunable.description: If enabled, work entries will be captured by this filter.

TunableVariant.name: region_resource
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, only entries from zones within this region will be captured by this fiter.

TunableList.name: required_packs
TunableList.description: If any packs are tuned here, at least one of them must be present for this filter to appear in the UI.
